https://sep4-ed4e9-default-rtdb.europe-west1.firebasedatabase.app/ . Sign Up
Email: sep4@via.dk\n\nPhone no: 81 90 36 94
Our Project\nConsists of an embedded system for Art galleries. The main purpose - present the data of the room on an Android app (temperature, humidity, CO2) and act accordingly (open a window, etc).
IOT team \nResponsible for the embedded part of the system.\n \nDataWarehouse team\nResponsible for getting the data from embedded system and storing it in a data warehouse. Also making a web service to make the data accesible.\n \nAndroid team\nResponsible for making an android application that will present the data received from the data warehouse in various ways.
